body:
Just wondering if any of the registered tournament teams have logos? Would be cool if they added a feature on the forums/ingame where you could see a team logo next to the team name in the forums, or a team logo on the tab list during the tournament

Example; Tablist ingame
________________________________________________
*Logo*  "Team Name"  |  *Logo* "Team Name"
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"[BMB] BmB"                  |  "[BEAR] Legoche"
"[AMEN] _DC"                 |  " [CRNS] Posighdun"
"[PBB] Stimulating"       |  " [VAR] Jiveh"
________________ Scrim01 Xena TM _____________

Example; Forum/Team Page
__________
|                | Cacalmarin
|   Logo    |
|                | [AMEN] Take me to church
----------------
